extension_description: Screengrab! Slaat een webpagina als een afbeelding.
settings.label: Settings
preference.image.name: Image text
preference.image.name.template.title.cro: * {#TITLE#} - full title, {#TITLE10#},{#TITLE30#},{#TITLE50#},... - title will be cropped
preference.convertumlaute.description: Convert German Umlaute in filename (ä -> ae, ö -> oe ...)
preference.image.save.path_desc1: This is the relative path in the Downloads folder to which the download will be offered by default.
preference.image.save.path_desc3: Absolute paths, empty paths, paths containing backlinks «..» will be ignored!
preference.image.save.quickly: Quickly save (without prompt to filename and dir)
preference.show.context_menu.main.label: Show menu in the main context menu
preference.copy_clipboard_notification: Show notification when copy image to Clipboard
preference.use.only.page.force: Capture page: always use only «forced mode»
preference.use.only.page.force.label: «forced mode» uses a complicated algorithm and in some cases, the browser may be temporarily slowed down.
preference.hotkeys.closetab: close tab after the action is completed
selection.fast_mode.temp: Temporarily: press and hold «Shift» or «Control» before the selection
selection.fast_mode.always: Always: enable in the settings: Main - Selection: Fast mode
upload_png_large: Image PNG is large. Convert to JPEG?
upload_image_is_big: Upload is canceled. Max size of an image is 10 MB
copy_image_done: Image is copied to the clipboard
adv_title.label: Advertisement
adv_desc_1.label: Dear friends and users of my add-on, in the process of development of this extension I have invested many hours spent on: adding features, fixing bugs, improvements, not to mention the support of all the users who have asked for help.
adv_desc_2.label: Would you like to get discounts and free coupons for more than 100 leading online retailers?
adv_desc_3.label: Suggested ads - are small tips about up-to-the-minute rebates, shown on the top of the page for certain shops you visit.
adv_desc_4.label: The additional income generated by this optional advertising, will benefit to the further development of this and other projects.
adv_desc_5.label: Thanks for your support, I would appreciate any decision you make!
adv_privacy_policy.label: Privacy Policy
adv_cancel.label: No, I don't want to support your work
adv_accept.label: Yes, I fully support the author
adv_is_enabled.label: Advertising is enabled
adv_is_disabled.label: Advertising is disabled
adv_customization.label: Advertising customization
adv_change_status.label: change status
pref.reset.settings.label: Reset settings to defaults
pref.settings.saved.label: Settings saved
pref.close.settings.label: Close
pref.reset.template.label: Restore by default
